text: Just Dance may mean: *Just Dance (video game series), made and published by Ubisoft **Just Dance (video game), the first game in the series, 2009 *"Just Dance" (song), a 2008 song by Lady Gaga *"Just Dance", a 2017 song by Lala Hsu from The Inner Me *Just Dance (Indian TV series), a 2011 Indian dance-reality series *Just Dance (South Korean TV series), a 2018 television series
title: Just Dance
